roleset.name: count inaccurately
roleset.note: MISCOUNT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: miscount-v
example.text: He-1 counted 'only' 20 bombers left in formation ( *-1 having originally miscounted them as 27, not 21).

example.name: miscount-n
example.text: the census grossly underestimated the number of men that would enlist for the draft because of the miscount of young black men.
